ygData.subject: Re: Some Verant feedback i got
ygData.msgSnippet: ... level ... I ... One paladin, one mage, and one enchanter.  They were all commenting on the uselessness of a wizard, due to the fact that they could not
ygData.messageBody:
> <<Example last night I was laughed at when I asked if any one wanted a
level
> 12 wizard. (by 3 people over shout no less) If that is the opinion of the
> majority of the populace in a game that is suppose to be group only, then
I
> say we need something to make us more valuable...>>
>
> I am not sure who was laughing or for what reason but rest assured that
> wizards have no problems finding a group.

One paladin, one mage, and one enchanter. They were all commenting on the
uselessness of a wizard, due to the fact that they could not help with any
monster that 'counts'. They also made comment on the close damage ammounts
that everyone enjoyed, and how they could buff/debuff as well. I quote " I
wouldn't group with a worthless experience point sucking wizard if my life
depended on it!" my reply was "one day you may regret you said that." Oh
well the problem is not wheather it is true or not... just the percepetion.
That is the problem. And that needs to be rectified. Sadly I don't even
have a suggestion on how to change that view either...

> Yours,
> ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr

Respectfully,


Rutreeii
Cazic-Thul
